snippet.title: The Sims 4: Build Mode Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Experience fast, flexible & fun home building in our The Sims 4 Build Mode gameplay video.

See more of #TheSims4 at http://thesims.com

With Build Mode in The Sims 4, effortlessly construct the home of your dreams! Build Mode in The Sims 4 will allow you push and pull the size of the rooms, drag and drop objects, and pick and place styled rooms directly from an in-game catalog.  
 
The Sims 4: Available for PC in Fall 2014.
 
Preorder The Sims 4 today: http://bit.ly/1pj4DTW
